Summary Note:
The RM first encountered Hanna Lilli Schäfer at a golf tournament in Berlin. They played a round of golf together and discussed potential business ventures, which led to a strong professional relationship.
Hanna Lilli Schäfer is a 66 year old retired CEO from Germany. She has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
Looking for a private bank with a deep understanding of wealth management, she joined Julius Baer for its expertise.
Family Background: Hanna Lilli Schäfer is currently widowed. Her children are named Jessica and Imke.
Education Background:
Hanna earned her secondary school diploma from Lessing-Gymnasium Frankfurt in 1978.
Hanna earned her degree from Frankfurt School of Finance & Management in 1981.
Occupation History:
Hanna Lilli Schäfer is a 66 year old retired CEO from Germany.
Hanna Lilli Schäfer began her professional journey as a Hotel Manager at Accor Hotels Deutschland GmbH in 1982, laying the foundation for future success.
After gaining experience, she took on the role of General Manager at NH Hotel Group Deutschland GmbH in 1987, further expanding her skill set.
In 1991, she joined Marriott International GmbH as a Regional Vice President, taking on new challenges and responsibilities that helped her grow both personally and professionally.
In 1994, she transitioned to Marriott International GmbH to take on the position of CEO, capitalizing on her expertise to propel business growth.
Wealth Summary:
She managed to save approximately 2310000 EUR from her earnings at all companies.
Client does not have any properties.She does not have any inheritances.
Client Summary: In summary, Hanna has demonstrated a strong work ethic and financial acumen, positioning them well for the future.
